community.title: Community Generations
community.guestDescription: You can freely explore all public content. To create your own sentences, like posts, and unlock advanced features,
community.beFirstToShare: Be the first to share a generation with the community!
community.createWordCollections: Create your own word collections, generate AI-enhanced sentences with reasoning explanations, and share your learning journey with others.
community.endOfFeed: You've reached the end of the feed!

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.startCreating: Start creating AI-powered sentences with your words!
profile.downloadAll: Download all your words and generations
profile.deleteAllGenerationsMessage: This will permanently delete all your generations. This action cannot be undone.

home.title: AI-Powered English Learning
home.subtitle: Generate contextual sentences using your vocabulary with advanced AI reasoning. Powered by SiliconFlow's Qwen/QwQ-32B model for enhanced learning experiences.
home.poweredBy: Powered by SiliconFlow & Qwen/QwQ-32B with AI Reasoning

features.aiEnhancedDesc: Advanced Qwen/QwQ-32B model generates natural sentences with detailed reasoning explanations for better learning.
features.publicAccessDesc: Explore community content without signing up. Browse thousands of AI-generated sentences freely.
features.grammarInsightsDesc: Receive detailed grammar explanations and AI reasoning to understand sentence construction better.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to enhance your English learning with AI-powered sentence generation
howItWorks.step1Desc: Explore public content freely or create an account for full features
howItWorks.step2Desc: Build your vocabulary collection with words you want to practice
howItWorks.step3Desc: Create contextual sentences with AI reasoning and grammar explanations
howItWorks.step4Desc: Share with the community and learn from others' creations

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your English Learning?
cta.subtitle: Experience the power of AI-enhanced language learning with personalized sentence generation, detailed explanations, and a supportive community.

aiConfig.title: API Key Configuration
aiConfig.subtitle: Manage your SiliconFlow API key settings. Use the platform's default key or provide your own for personalized access.
aiConfig.platformDescription: Our platform uses SiliconFlow's advanced Qwen/QwQ-32B model with reasoning capabilities. You can use our default API key or provide your own for enhanced control.
aiConfig.platformKeyDescription: Use our secure, pre-configured SiliconFlow API key. This is the recommended option for most users.
aiConfig.customKeyDescription: Provide your own SiliconFlow API key for personalized access and usage tracking.
aiConfig.securityNote: Your API key is stored securely and never shared with other users.
aiConfig.customKeyNotSet: Custom API key selected but not configured
aiConfig.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
aiConfig.switchToPlatformMessage: You are currently using a custom API key. Switching to the platform API key will remove your custom key from the system.
aiConfig.switchToPlatformWarning: This action cannot be undone. You will need to re-enter your custom API key if you want to use it again later.

apiKey.title: API Key Configuration
apiKey.subtitle: Manage your SiliconFlow API key settings. Use the platform's default key or provide your own for personalized access.
apiKey.platformDescription: Our platform uses SiliconFlow's advanced Qwen/QwQ-32B model with reasoning capabilities. You can use our default API key or provide your own for enhanced control.
apiKey.platformKeyDescription: Use our secure, pre-configured SiliconFlow API key. This is the recommended option for most users.
apiKey.customKeyDescription: Provide your own SiliconFlow API key for personalized access and usage tracking.
apiKey.existingKeyHint: You have an existing API key configured, you can modify it here.
apiKey.securityNote: Your API key is stored securely and never shared with other users.
apiKey.customKeyNotSet: Custom API key selected but not configured
apiKey.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
apiKey.switchToPlatformMessage: You are currently using a custom API key. Switching to the platform API key will remove your custom key from the system.
apiKey.switchToPlatformWarning: This action cannot be undone. You will need to re-enter your custom API key if you want to use it again later.
